channel.title: Death
channel.description:
Dear god, I feel so stupid for asking this, but I've seriously forgotten how I change the coords my character teleports to when he dies.
I know, I know, "retard" etc.
It's on a deltascape base, lets get this resolved and so we can all put it behind us, k?

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @Beasty_x Beasty_x
item.description:

[quote=“SkillersDream, post:5, topic:248647”]Its An Anti Leech in his Source. you should Have to Figure it Out if you wanted to use it that much[/quote]he ask how to change death spawn on delta base ^^ not how to fix anti leech

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Edit your main post, no ones retarded.
Your question isn’t retarded, and you’re not retarded.

Everyone has questions.

The code `Rich posted. Search it in the Client class.
Underneath it for delta, the pre set coords should look like this.

toX = 3227; toY = 3217;

A few lines below, change this also.

absX = 3227; absY = 3217;

That’s all you have to change

Read full topic

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @mad_Man_Joe mad Man Joe
item.description:
@mad_Man_Joe wrote:

Thank you for that rather roundabout way of telling me where it is.
But meh, it got the job done.

Just some creative criticism 'Rich, most people in this forum are utter newbs at coding, so maybe in posts you should go into more depth?

But anyway, thanks for that. Done now.

Read full topic
